header.tagline: Senior AI/ML Engineer & Tech Content Creator

paragraphs: üëã Welcome! I'm Senior Developer with almost 5 years of experience, I simplify complex tasks and believe that ‚Äòif it is structured, it can be automated‚Äô. My keen interest in Generative AI and its capabilities has allowed me to build and even win prizes by building and presenting Generative AI-based applications in various places. So let me ask you, what are we going to build next?

items.title: YouTube Channel
items.description: Created a YouTube channel for sharing tutorials and insights on AI/ML, cloud technologies, and software development best practices.

items.title: Professional Network
items.description: Built a strong professional network of 5,000+ connections, actively sharing knowledge and insights about AI/ML, cloud technologies, and career development.

items.title: Top 1% Mentor
items.description: Ranked in the top 1% of mentors on Topmate, helping developers and professionals grow in their AI/ML careers with personalized guidance and industry insights.

items.title: Instagram Community
items.description: Building an engaged community on Instagram, sharing insights on AI/ML, cloud technologies, and personal development.

items.title: Hashnode Community
items.description: Growing a community on Hashnode, sharing articles and tutorials on AI/ML, cloud technologies, and software development.

items.title: Industry Certifications
items.description: Earned 10+ professional certifications from AWS, Oracle, Microsoft, and other leading technology companies, demonstrating expertise across multiple cloud platforms.

items.name: Manzil caf√© - A Virtual Space
description: A virtual social caf√© platform with multi-tenant caf√© spaces, real-time chat, AI bartender integration, voice messaging, virtual ordering, and enterprise-grade security. Experience the future of social interaction in beautifully themed virtual environments.
Features:
Chat rooms.
AI assistant/companion.
Pomodoro Focus room
Google Auth

items.name: Automation Generator Tool
description: This application allows users to upload an SOP based pdf, which lets them create an Automation around it, by providing a block daigram (text based), a script and list of pre-requisites to run the script, The AI being utilized here is Gemini-pro.
Features:
Queries MongoDB for existing solutions.
Upload SOP based PDF & Summarising of the PDF.
AI-powered script, flow and pre-requisite generation.
Option to regenerate review code and regenerate it.

items.name: Automated Data filling into CRM Tool
description: A modern full-stack application that uses AI to extract contact, company, and deal information from meeting summaries. Built with React frontend and FastAPI backend.
Features:
AI-Powered Extraction: Uses OpenAI GPT models to extract structured CRM data
PII Detection: Identifies and extracts personally identifiable information
Data Persistence: MongoDB Atlas integration for storing leads
Export Capabilities: Download data as CSV or JSON
Dashboard Analytics: View statistics and insights

items.name: Gemini Based- Streamlined Mobile Devices Research
description: This application uses Streamlit to compare YouTube videos by fetching transcripts, summarizing content, and generating comparison tables. It leverages Google's Gemini AI for content generation.
Features:
Extract transcripts from YouTube videos.
Summarize video content using Gemini AI.
Generate comparison tables in HTML, CSV, and PDF formats.
Download comparison results.

responsibilities: Developed a Cyber AI Package to detect PII, prompt injection, and jailbreak attempts using a combination of Microsoft Presidio, custom ML models with 97% accuracy, and pattern-based logic.
Designed solution architecture for a Policy Assessment Engine that utilizes OpenAI APIs to evaluate compliance narratives and automate risk scoring planned to reduce human effort by 50%.
Built an Agentic AI system to analyse ZScaler activity logs and generate real-time alerts based on user behaviour, enhancing cloud security posture monitoring.
Automated scripts for 20,000+ devices, utilizing CrowdStrike API and a combination of Python, AWS Lambda, EventBridge, and task schedulers.

Built RAG-based KB article retrieval for multiple customers with Gemini and Claude 3 using Vertex AI and Amazon Bedrock respectively, utilized Spanner and MongoDB for storing Vector embeddings bringing down time of resolution by 30-40%.

Developed multiple Python solutions to fetch EC2 instances data using Lambda functions and fetch WAF reports data from S3 buckets with boto3, worked with Lambda, ECR, ECS, RDS, DynamoDB, Cloud Formation (CDK), AWS CLI etc.

Implemented multiple generative AI (Gen AI) based solutions, such as Chat Interface using Lang Chain, added query analysis for improving search quality for phrasing to LLMs while maintaining chat history and meeting notes summary generator.

Ensured consistent results using Python, Terraform and PowerShell by implementing across multiple clouds such as AWS and Azure for managing servers, creating infrastructures and deploying solutions, reducing deployment time by in range of 40-50%.
As a senior developer provided feedback, mentored and guided colleagues and new joiners for smooth transition in projects, and authored white papers and SOPs for simplifying the DevOps process.

items.name: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2025 Certified AI Foundations Associate
Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2024 Generative AI Certified Professional
Red Hat Enterprise Linux Automation with Ansible (RH294) - Ver. 9.0
Red Hat System Administration II (RH134) - Ver. 9.0
Building AI-Powered Search with MongoDB Vector Search
